DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effects of different rates of Caudal Epidural Steroid Injection (CESI) on clinical outcomes of the patients.
DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparison of Clinical Outcome After Different Rate of Infusion in Caudal Epidural Steroid Injection
DOC.criteria: lumbosacral spinal stenosis with radiculopathy no improvement after conservative treatment for 6 weeks previous CESI or spinal surgery skin infection at injection site uncontrolled diabetes mellitus abnormal coagulogram vertebral fracture previous history of allergy to steroid or anesthetic agent
